author: ehu
msg: Enhance GNU .po and .pot maintenance support.
* configure.in
(enable-nls): Detect the msgmerge program for use in Makefile.in
* Makefile.in
(locale-gnu-pot): Update to include comments from sources.
(locale-gnu-po-update): New target for consistent merging from template.

author: kfogel
msg: * doc/book/book/foreword.xml: Happily shill for the Mother Ship.
CollabNet effectively subsidized a lot of the time Ben, Mike, and Fitz
spent gathering usage information, not to mention all the time spent
actually developing Subversion of course.  Therefore mention CollabNet
in the foreword, after checking that the authors are okay with this.

author: kfogel
msg: * COMMITTERS: Add niqueco / Nicolás Lichtmaier <nick@reloco.com.ar> for
.po files.

author: kfogel
msg: * HACKING: Describe Patch Manager role, in preparation for upcoming
solicitation.

author: jpieper
msg: Document the two new parameters to svn_client__prev_log_path
introduced in r9592.
* subversion/libsvn_client/client.h
(svn_client__prev_log_path): Document the action_p and
copyfrom_rev_p parameters.
